director.name: 亚历杭德罗·马特 Alejandro Mathé

introduction: 20世纪80年代的一家自助洗衣店。当悲痛的学生帕特里夏想在事故现场使用显灵板联系她已故的祖母作为最后的手段时，一位不速之客要求进入。PREISE & FESTIVALS- Ongezien Kort Filmfestival 2020, Antwerpen- Golden Short Film Festival 2020 (Quarter Finals »Golden Student Short«), Avezzano- One Shot Terrassa City of Film Festival 2020, Spanien- Reelout Virtual Queer Film Festival 2021, Kanada- Living Skies Student Film Festival 2021, Regina, Saskatchewan, Kanada- Beeston Film Festival 2021, Nottingham (UK)- FilmSchauPlätze NRW 2021- Paracinema Film Festival 2021, Derby (UK)- One Take Film Festival 2021 in Zagreb, Kroatien
